title: Poster, "Herman Miller Summer Picnic, July 26, 1986", 1986
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Imitating cellophane food packaging, an image of orange and yellow dried fruit, curved down towards center, and inscribed in blue on white field at the bottom, in a band: "HERMAN MILLER [repeated] / SUMMER PICNIC [repeated] / JULY 26, 1986 [repeated]".
